content:
I'm glad I could help you come up with a plan to increase your physical activity levels. Remember, the key is to start small and be consistent. Don't be too hard on yourself if you miss a day or two, just get back on track and keep moving forward.

By the way, have you thought about tracking your blood sugar levels and adjusting your diet accordingly? I've been using my OneTouch Verio blood glucose meter to track my levels, and it's been really helpful in managing my diet and staying healthy.
